channel.title: Duel Arena Help!?
channel.description: So when i go to the duel arena everything works, but its who ever accepts the second accept screen isnt allowed to attack and cant fight back even with auto retaliate, so it counts down for the guy that didnt accept first then the guy that did it doesnt count down and isnt allowed to fight how do i fix that?

item.title: Duel Arena Help!?
